Text.Page: <PCNAME> spoke to a goblin and baraka about the archdevans' activities in Ex Prima.

We must gather information about the archdevas' activities, but the Seekers will not be all that useful. Let us seek another.

There is a goblin, Jagreg, who can be found east of Baaldaz Post. Ask him if he has seen any archdevas around."I'll talk to him."

Stay away from Jagreg's moneytrees, !

Jagreg saw them first! That makes them Jagreg's pecunia fruit!"Hmm. I can get them for you...for a price."

...trade? Alright.

Jagreg agrees! Get them now!"Okay, wait here."

Hah! Jagreg is rich!

Good work, . Now, what you want to know?"What are the archdevas doing?"

Archdevas? dies soon, Jagreg thinks.

Archdevas digging up the past. Don't know why."Do you know where?"

Kamun.

Kamun knows where. Kamun watches archdevas. Studies. Kamun dies soon too, Jagreg thinks.

Ask Kamun."Enjoy your pecunia fruit, Jagreg."
The archdevas have numerous camps in this region. Any one of them could prove the locus of their Storm Barrier apparatus.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Which one is most likely?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

An excellent question!

The best way to find an accurate answer is to interrogate an archdeva or two—but they are notoriously dishonest. I have only been able to obtain accurate intelligence by judicious application of truth needles."Any chance you have a spare?"

Alas, my supply is depleted. I was just now preparing to mount an expedition to collect more components—but if you would undertake that task, I would be willing to make one for you.

Simply acquire some glittering scales from the nearby chupathingies."All right."
Were you successful in obtaining the glittering scales?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"All in a day's work."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Still searching for glittering scales? Ascertaining the truth requires it.

You have done well. Now just give me a moment...and...there!

May this truth needle serve you well."Thank you, Kamun."
